Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord and Nighlight arrived at the place.

"Hey what's happen?" asked Windlord to BH and Perplex

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer looked around puzzled. Perplex walked by him.
> 
> Perplex: What's wrong?
> 
> Burning Hammer: I don't know where the conference room is.
> 
> Sarge walked up next to Burning Hammer.
> 
> Perplex: Follow me.
> 
> Perplex walked to the conference room and Burning Hammer and Sarge 
followed him there. The 3 waited for Grounded. Zeni came in shortly 
later.
> 
> Perplex: Where'd you get a commlink, little guy?
> 
> Zeni: From Arrow.
> 
> Arrow walked in and Perplex looked at him.
> 
> Arrow: What do you want? If you don't want something, don't look at 
me like that...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: gunthers8@n... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, June 26, 2001 11:51 PM
>   Subject: Groundeds Calling
> 
> 
>   Grounded heard everything that was commencing. About Deemos, and 
>   Trinity. "I must do something." He opened a comm link to all of 
the 
>   Chivtron. "This is Grounded, I am calling a meeting starting 
>   immediatly.  Meet in the confernece room. It is urgent and 
invaluable 
>   to miss for our defense. Thank you." He began a walk for the 
>   Conference room.
> 
> 
>
